body_html:
I understand the maintenance cost of having ATen build separately as well is a bit higher but projects like https://github.com/fragcolor-xyz/nimtorch that are using only ATen and actually build ATen even on exotic platforms like game consoles were kind depending on that simpler cmake build.

I hope ATen will keep its "A tensor library" identity in the future.

body:
I understand the maintenance cost of having ATen build separately as well is a bit higher but projects like https://github.com/fragcolor-xyz/nimtorch that are using only ATen and actually build ATen even on exotic platforms like game consoles were kind depending on that simpler cmake build.

I hope ATen will keep its "A tensor library" identity in the future.
